title: Secrets & Cover Ups
cleaned_text: Cover-ups have become part of our society with many believing powerful groups, such as the Illuminati, are hiding secrets from the general public. These new documentaries explore popular theories related to UFO sightings, economic collapse, extreme social unrest, and more. Watch as filmmakers speak with people who have come forward to reveal that these events are not mere conspiracy theories. Our collection of documentaries exposes the true stories of media disinformation and cover-ups right from the insiders who had direct access to the power makers. Watch the best conspiracy documentaries to learn the truth about what has been hidden from the public.
